Chinese:
呵啊啊啊啊啊啊～
呼～

English:
Ah! What?! Who?! Hehe... S-Sorry. I can't believe
I conked out like that in front of a customer.
Chinese:
啊！那個、這是、呃、那個……不好意思，
讓客人看到這種樣子……
Korean:
…아! 저, 이건, 그, 저기… 죄송합니다
손님께 이런 모습을…
German:
Ah! Wie?! Wer?! Hihi ... Entschuldige. Kaum zu
fassen, dass ich vor Kunden so eingenickt bin.

English:
All the crazy things around here in the last
couple days have really--Yaaaaawn!--tuckered
me out.
Chinese: 都是因為最近發生的奇怪事件，讓我有點疲倦……
Korean: 최근 일어나는 이상한 사건 때문에, 조금 피곤해서요…
German:
Was hier in letzter Zeit so los war, hat mich echt
geschafft ... *Gääähn*

English:
A Cyber Sleuth? You do random acts of kindness
and sleuthing? Hahaha! That's awesome!
Chinese:
電腦偵探？困擾的時候可以諮詢？
哦～
German:
Ein Cyber-Detektiv? Eine Spürnase, die Leuten
helfen will? Hahaha! Genial!

English:
Eeep! I really shouldn't be talking to customers
like this... My bad...
Chinese:
哇！
是說我竟然和客人聊這種事……
Korean:
하웃!
그보다 손님께 이런 얘기를 해 버리다니…
German:
Huch! So sollte ich mit Kunden eigentlich nicht
reden ... Entschuldige ...

English:
Let's start from the top, I'll be on the ball
this time.
Chinese:
可以重新開始嗎？
如果你再來跟我說話，我會更有禮貌的！
Korean:
다시 해도 될까요!?
다시 한 번 말을 걸어 주시면 제대로 할 테니까요!
German:
Fangen wir noch mal von vorne an. Ich reiße mich
dieses Mal zusammen.
